name: Fire Crawler
description:
Made for the 1-Button Jam 2022.

Fire Crawl is a top-down game played through the use of 1 button (choice of Spacebar, LMB, or RMB).

Assets Used:
Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/ambientloading-screen-game-music-pack
Fire Crackling Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/fireplace-sound-loop
Fire Burn Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/fire-evil-spell
Asset Pack: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
